$example searches: How many wins do I need to get all arena rewards?
Number of wins needed to get full arena rewards?

search.title: Number of wins needed for arena rewards

embeds.title: Arena rewards
description<text>: • You can unlock different levels of arena rewards by accumulating wins.
• You need a total of **375** wins to unlock all levels (225 wins to unlock level-20).

fields.name: Tips
value<text>: • On Day 13, you should be close to unlocking all rewards.
• On Day 14 you can focus on pushing for arena rank.
• In case you miss a day of attack, you can also recover easily.
If you do __not__ have Battle Pass:
• On Day 13, you should be close to unlocking level-20 rewards.
• On Day 14 you can focus on pushing for arena rank.

fields.name: Wins needed for reward levels
fields.value:
``` 1 ~  5:  5 wins each level
 6 ~ 10: 10 wins each level
11 ~ 30: 15 wins each level```
